PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03372022-04-05,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActCanada Revenue Agency Act
SubjectOrder assigning responsibility for Canada Emergency Business Account program loan collections to the Minister of National Revenue
PrecisOrder assigning the MINISTER OF NATIONAL REVENUE the provision and administration of services to assist Export Development Canada in collecting loans made under the CANADA EMERGENCY BUSINESS ACCOUNT program that are in default.
AttachmentsAttachment
